job_tasks.phrase: Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions.
job_tasks.justification: Developing virtual assistants, especially those with voice and text capabilities, falls under creating and adapting AI models for specific interaction tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating specific functionalities (like banking features) into AI models (virtual assistants) to improve their performance is a form of model adaptation or extension.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality.
job_tasks.justification: The act of integrating features into an existing system (virtual assistants) to enhance functionality is a software development task.
This phrase indicates a focus on improving customer service, which is a business objective that the technical work aims to achieve.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Defining project requirements and collaborating with other teams to deliver solutions are core aspects of understanding business needs and aligning technical efforts.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform.

classification.rationale: The job focuses on developing virtual assistants for voice and text interactions, integrating specific features, and leveraging platforms like Copilot Studio. This aligns well with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who builds applications on top of generative models and handles user-facing software systems.
